title: Strengthening Clinical Competencies: Instructional Design Scenarios for Improving Online Introductory Biology Courses

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 80% comprehension of core biology concepts (cell structure, genetic laws, ecosystem principles) through three cycles of iterative revision learning.
Learners can observe biological phenomena using online lab simulation tools and submit data analysis projects with a 90% completion rate.
Learners reduce learning gaps by 50% by writing three or more self-reflection reports per learning stage through peer feedback and instructor coaching.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
